flawed_nl_solution:
The entire sq ft of the living room is LxW so the room is 16x20 = <<16*20=320>>320 sq ft
Tom has already put down 250 sq ft so he needs to put down 320-250 = 50 sq ft of flooring
The boxes contain 10 sq ft of flooring per box and he needs 50 more sq ft of flooring so he needs 50/10 = <<50/10=5>>5 more boxes
#### 5

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 70, not 50. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
